articles.author: Bloomberg
articles.title: Nobody’s going to refuse a vaccine: Ukraine scoops up Europe's unwanted Astrazeneca Covid-19 vaccine shots - Hindustan Times
articles.description: As safety concerns prompt western European countries to limit the use of AstraZeneca Plc’s coronavirus shot, Ukraine is leading a charge from the continent’s east to scoop up unwanted doses.
articles.content:
